welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Tiverton, a charming city known for its beautiful landscapes and rich history. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at State Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at State Airport serves as a gateway for travelers coming from or going to other countries.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at New Bedford Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at New Bedford Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at T. F. Green Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at T. F. Green Airport serves domestic flights for American Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at T. F. Green Airport serves domestic flights for Delta and Southwest Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at T. F. Green Airport serves domestic flights for JetBlue and United Airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Memorial Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Memorial Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at North Central Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at North Central Airport serves private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network.
